title: Wedding Fever
description: An unlikely candidate for a romantic hero…A romance author looking for love off the page… When Cat’s eyes lift from the computer screen, they land on Sam. He sure looks good in a cowboy hat.And, he saved her from one mad chicken… Sam might just be what she needs to start the New Year off right. But Cat’s not good with real-life love and she’s made mess of things.Is a happy ending in her future or will she have to say The End to this romance?You’ll love this story because everyone wants to find the man who loves them with all their flaws.Get it today!
author: Lucy McConnell
